input_args.passage: 'Here at the End of All Things - Wikipedia | Here At The End Of All Things is a CD/DVD by American mathcore band The Number Twelve Looks Like You. input_args.claim: 'From the first and second sources, we learn that the title "Here at the End of All Things" is a quote from the book The Lord of the Rings.'
